page.title: 19HIGH AND OVER, SEAFORD
page.content: {HIGH AND OVER IS A LOCAL BEAUTY SPOT {AND VIEW POINT.}IT IS SITUATED ABOUT HALF A MILE OUT OF SEAFORD ON THE ALFRISTON ROAD. THERE IS{A CAR PARK}WHICH IS USUALLY FULL ON SUMMER AFTERNOONS. FROM THE CARPARK, A SHORT WALK THROUGH SOME TREES BRINGS YOU TO{AN OPEN HILL TOP. {BELOW IS THE CUCKMERE RIVER. LOOKING{SOUTH}THERE IS THE VIEW OVER {THE SEVEN SISTERS CLIFFS AND THE RIVER {ESTUARY TO THE ENGLISH CHANNEL. {NORTHWARD}AFFORDS VIEWS OF THE VALLEY TOWARDS THE ATTRACTIVE VILLAGE OF {ALFRISTON.}ACROSS THE VALLEY ONE CAN SEE THE EXTENT OF{FRISTON FOREST}AND THE FLINT WALLS OF{LITLINGTON}VILLAGE. ON THE HILLSIDE DIRECTLY BELOW IS AN ANCIENT{WHITE HORSE IN CHALK}WHICH CAN BE EXPLORED AND MAY BE VIEWED PROPERLY FROM ACROSS THE VALLEY; VOLUNTEERS HAVE BEEN REPAIRING IT THIS SUMMER.
